original_text: He said, “Take your son, your only son Isaac, whom you love, and go to the land of Moriah, and offer him there as a burnt offering on one of the mountains of which I shall tell you.”
korean_text: 여호와께서 이르시되 네 아들 네 사랑하는 독자 이삭을 데리고 모리아 땅으로 가서 내가 네게 일러 준 한 산 거기서 그를 번제로 드리라

sentences.original_text: “Take your son, your only son Isaac,
sentences.korean_translation: 네 아들, 네 독자 이삭을 데려가라,

sentences.original_text: and go to the land of Moriah,
and offer him there as a burnt offering
of which I shall tell you.”
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 네게 일러 줄 그 곳에서.”
